content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System (x=-9.5, y=-0.5 to x=0.5, y=6.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler at position (x=-5.0, y=2.5)
- Steam engine at position (x=0.5, y=6.5)
- Pipe system connecting water from offshore pump to boiler
- Pipe system connecting steam from boiler to steam engine
- Small electric pole near steam engine

### Coal Mining and Transport System (x=16.0, y=0.0 to x=-3.5, y=2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x=16.0, y=0.0)
- Burner inserter at position (x=16.5, y=1.5) that moves coal from drill to chest
- Wooden chest at position (x=16.5, y=2.5) for coal storage
- Burner inserter at position (x=16.5, y=3.5) that moves coal from chest to transport belt
- Transport belt system (22 belts) connecting from position (x=16.5, y=4.5) to position (x=-2.5, y=2.5)
- Burner inserter at position (x=-3.5, y=2.5) that moves coal from belt to boiler

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting System (x=16.5, y=70.5 to x=24.5, y=73.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (x=16.5, y=70.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=17.5, y=68.5) providing power to the drill
- Wooden chest at position (x=16.5, y=72.5) collecting iron ore
- Stone furnace at position (x=19.0, y=73.0) for smelting iron ore
- Inserter at position (x=20.5, y=73.5) that moves iron plates from furnace to chest
- Wooden chest at position (x=21.5, y=73.5) for iron plate storage
- Inserter at position (x=22.5, y=73.5) that moves iron plates to another chest
- Wooden chest at position (x=23.5, y=73.5) for iron plate transfer
- Inserter at position (x=24.5, y=73.5) that moves iron plates from chest to transport belt
- Small electric pole at position (x=20.5, y=71.5) providing power to inserters
- Small electric pole at position (x=24.5, y=71.5) providing power to inserters
- Transport belt system connecting from position (x=25.5, y=73.5) to position (x=27.5, y=75.5)

### Copper Ore Mining and Smelting System (x=-46.5, y=73.5 to x=-38.5, y=79.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (x=-46.5, y=73.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=-44.5, y=71.5) providing power to the drill
- Wooden chest at position (x=-46.5, y=75.5) collecting copper ore
- Stone furnace at position (x=-41.0, y=79.0) for smelting copper ore
- Wooden chest at position (x=-38.5, y=79.5) for copper plate storage

### Gear Production System (x=28.5, y=75.5 to x=33.5, y=77.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (x=30.5, y=75.5) with iron gear wheel recipe
- Inserter at position (x=28.5, y=75.5) that inputs iron plates into assembler
- Inserter at position (x=32.5, y=75.5) that outputs iron gears to chest
- Wooden chest at position (x=33.5,
